name: Space Ripper
description: Space Ripper is a hardcore space shooter. There’s no saves, a little HP and many dangerous enemies… If you can survive for 5 minutes you are arcade God!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster Processor Memory: 512 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2 Ghz or faster Processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
